jump_scares.spoiler: An infected lunges out from a doorway
Guzman appears behind Angela
Edwin, now an infected, suddenly turns around and snarls
Anciana, as an infected, suddenly screams
An infected is revealed behind the door
An infected appears and attacks a soldier
A monkey appears and shrieks
Mirroring the final jump scare from the first film, Angela is pulled back into the darkness
After Martos turns around in the apartment hallway, an infected comes running at him
Martos, now an infected, lunges at the camera
Out of nowhere, an infected boy drops down from the ceiling and grabs Larra
The infected boy suddenly jumps onto the priest’s back
When Larra turns, an infected appears in the doorway
An infected girl appears at the end of the hallway
Ori accidentally fires a gun
Ori fires a second shot
An infected suddenly jumps out from the kitchen
Infected Martos lunges at the group
A hand shoots out of the water and grabs the SWAT chief
The creature appears and starts attacking Rosso
The creature suddenly appears behind the priest and attacks him
Angela shoots Rosso
The camera suddenly cuts to the scene from the beginning of the film of Angela being dragged into the darkness
The zombie suddenly gets up and growls at Anna
A bunch of zombies suddenly burst through the wall
After the end of a musical track, there is a sudden cut to Anna jumping out of a kiddie pool
A zombie lunges out from behind the christmas trees
After Chris closes the door there is a loud cut to Anna running through some plastic curtains
After the red ribbon flies across the screen a zombie santa appears behind it and jumps towards the camera
A butchered body jumps up off the ground at Shigeharu. [Video]
Teddy the bear pops up on the edge of the bed
The dollhouse bursts open
A silhouette of a demon appears in the hallway
Benny appears behind the phone
Jack slaps her across the face
An emergency vehicle rushes past
A woman’s face appears through shelving
A woman grabs Chris from behind
A zombie man jumps into frame
The camera pans back to Jonathan. A zombie screams beside Him
A zombie grabs man from the shadows
Candyman slits Jerrica’s throat
Trapped in a mirrored elevator, Anthony looks up and sees Candyman
In pitch black darkness, Sherman suddenly turns his flashlight on as Brianna screams
The room suddenly shakes and the lights cut out
Brandon jumps out at Tori (as a joke)
A figure moves quickly past in the foreground as Tori returns to the house
Brandon suddenly lunges at his mother and makes a barking noise
Caitlyn backs away from the open window and is startled when the bedroom door behind her bursts open
There is the sound of twigs snapping and suddenly Brandon appears right in front of Tori
The light suddenly breaks above the waitress
A figure moves past in the foreground
The door is suddenly pulled away
Brightburn suddenly lunges at the waitress
There is a knock at the door during a tense scene
Brightburn suddenly flies through the truck window
There is a sharp flashback to earlier in the movie as Kyle lies in bed
The baby with red eyes suddenly lunges at the camera just as Kyle wakes up from a dream
There is a loud crash and Tori screams
As the 911 operator answers, Brightburn suddenly smashes through the living room
As Tori says “I’m here I’m here” Brightburn flies past right in front of her
Brightburn suddenly tackles the sheriff as he says “you’re safe now” to Tori
The camera pans back to the deputy and Brightburn is now standing right behind her
Brightburn suddenly flies into the room where Tori is hiding
The bear appears in the foreground in the heavily zoomed shot, with a dramatic music chord
The phone in the foreground rings loudly, and Sari jumps up on the bed, startled by it
A sudden cut to a bear’s paw reaching for the lunch, with a dramatic music chord
A bear quickly runs across the frame in the background, accompanied by a scare chord
Peter is suddenly grabbed from behind and pulled back with force
After a few seconds of drawn out tension, the bear finally lunges towards the park ranger in the foreground with a roar
Just when Sari finally decides to step out from behind the tree, the bear’s paw suddenly smashes into it
The bear’s paw breaks through the glass and grabs the teenager’s head
A bloodied hand suddenly smashes against the window in the foreground, accompanied by a scare chord
After a long buildup of tension, a broom falls across the doorframe in front of the medic, startling him
The bear barges through the door in front of the medic
While Faith walks through the house in a dream sequence, her father suddenly drops down from the ceiling right in front of her face
Faith looks to her side and there is a cut to some masked coven members standing in the room accompanied by a sound effect
Faith leans forwards and Sissy is revealed to be standing behind her
There is a cut with a sound effect to a masked coven member watching Amy from a window
Faith says “My son is the devil,” followed by a cut to the child and a quick zoom as his face becomes distorted
Chucky attempts to bite Andy’s hand
A man jumps up in front of the woman talking to Nica
An alarm goes off as Nica looks at the spokes on the wheelchair
Chucky pops up in front of Claire who is strapped on the gurney
There is an abrupt cut to Nica picturing herself attacking Angela and Claire
Chucky smashes a bottle over Foley’s head
An image of Chucky’s mangled face flashes across the screen twice (accompanied by a piercing sound effect)
Foley suddenly yells “Madeleine!” during a tense scene
Chucky stabs Nica with a needle
Madeleine stands up and a nurse is standing right behind her
There is a sudden cut to Chucky with his arm in Madeleine’s mouth
Foley falls back and Chucky hits him over the head with a bottle
Tiffany suddenly appears behind the police officer looking in her car
Michael is suddenly stabbed in the head with an electric drill
Lionel’s mother appears behind the nurse
Lionel’s mother comes up behind Lionel as he turns on the lights
Hands break through the door and grab Lionel around his neck
Zakk surprises Brodie
Rikki suddenly opens his eyes and attacks Zakk and Brodie
Terry, who is now possessed, appears beside Brodie in the bathroom
A bloodied hand bursts through Abigail’s chest
The face of Abigail, who is now possessed, pops up in front of Zakk and Brodie
Uncle Albert, who is now possessed, suddenly appears behind Brodie
An axe head hits the wall just beside Brodie
A possessed Linda pops up in front of Ash
Ash lifts his head out of a puddle and screams, showing that he is possessed himself
A zombified hand comes out of the ground
Zombie Linda appears at the window as Ash looks out
Linda’s head falls into Ash’s lap
Headless Linda bursts into the shed holding a chainsaw
Ash sees himself in the mirror  the mirror Ash comes out of the mirror and grabs him
The scene abruptly cuts to Ash’s possessed hand
Ash stabs his own hand with a knife
Jake jumps at Ash
Possessed Henrietta bursts through the cellar floor
Henrietta’s horribly contorted face pokes through the cellar door
Ed is possessed and screams from behind Annie
There is a loud roaring noise
Jake and Bobby Joe break through a door
A possessed tree roars at Bobby Joe
Ash becomes possessed once more and lets out a roar
Possessed Ash appears at the cabin door
Possessed Ash appears at a window
Henrietta pops out of the cellar door and drags Jake into the cellar
Annie walks into possessed Ash
Ash ducks out of the way as Annie swings an axe at him
The skeleton of Jake appears beside Ash
Henrietta grabs Ash through the cellar stairs
Henrietta rises up out of a hole in the floor
There is a loud boom and a tree branch falls on the cabin
The physical incarnation of evil appears in the cabin doorway
Car hits the truck from the front
Car hits the truck from the front
Linda shouts before the car crash
A figure runs past the screen
The tied up girl suddenly becomes possessed and begins to yell. [Video]
A girl’s possessed face flashes briefly on the screen
As she is driving, Mia sees a girl standing in the middle of the road
The girl rises up out of the water behind Mia
Mia turns around suddenly as David begins to talk to her
Mia sees the demonic girl in the mirror
There is a quick cut to Mia attacking the dog with a hammer
Mia starts to scream as the door bursts open and wind gushes in
Mia grabs Olivia’s arm as she tries to get the gun
Olivia sees a demonic version of her reflection and the mirror breaks
A loud noise coming from the cellar startles Natalie
Natalie is dragged back into the cellar
A loud crash startles David while he is in the cellar
Mia suddenly appears and attacks David with a knife
David stops to look at a photo. Possessed Eric appears behind him and stabs him in the neck. [Video]
A hand comes out of the earth and grabs Mia. [Video]
The abomination appears at the driver-side window of the car and breaks through the glass
The abomination appears in front of Mia
A knife comes through the wall just in front of Mia
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
Cooper jumps at Don and barks after he calls for him
Don opens his eyes to find a girl with a distorted face over him
The doorbell unexpectedly rings during a quiet scene
The girl looks up at the camera and shrieks
Liz sees an eye in the drain

movies.title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers

jump_scares.spoiler: Michael grabs the ambulance attendant’s face
Michael suddenly grabs Jamie’s leg from under the bed
Loomis suddenly grabs Jamie accompanied by a sound effect
Loomis is attacked by Michael and thrown through a window
Michael grabs Jamie’s leg in the schoolhouse
Michael’s hand smashes through the window and rips out Earl’s neck
A pumpkin is thrown at the door
A loud noise is heard in the conversation
After the man in the red cape stands in front of the gate, the door behind Harper suddenly opens with a loud bang
The advertising sign on the left in the picture suddenly goes on after a long camera movement
After Evan laughs and turns around, a fake skeleton shoots into the picture with a loud scream from the right corner and frightens him
A big spider crawls through the opening. Suddenly there is a bang and hundreds of small spiders fall into the room
Nathan puts his hand in the hole to help Bailey find her ring. His hand suddenly gets pulled further in
When Harper looks at the door with the Emergency Exit sign, something from the other side hits this
Smoke comes out of the shaft under Nathan and frightens him
As Angela reaches through the fence for the crowbar, someone suddenly steps on her hand. It is teased relatively long, but the impact is still quite effective
The fake skeleton scares Evan again
Since the last 20 minutes scenes have been set up very often without any real jump scare. Here someone bangs on the door as Harper hides under the bed and tries to solve the house puzzle
A shotgun suddenly shoots through the door where The End is
The shotgun shoots again in a quiet scene
The unmasked man is suddenly shot as he squats by the box
Clown face appears behind Harper’s mother as she hugs her
Frank turns around and a door window shatters
The lights suddenly come on and a man jumps out from behind a box
Frank turns to his left and sees a man running at him
Baby jumps at Bill from behind
The group in the car turn on the car’s headlights revealing a man in front of the car
In one of the unusual dream-like parts of the film, a character jumps out at the camera
Denise begins walking out the room when Otis jumps at her from behind
An old man approaches Denise so she rotates to see another man behind at her
When the doors suddenly close, Denise begins to look around the room when one of the monsters comes at her from behind
Several children jump out in front of the girls
After closing her eyes Lorna is jumped by two men
As the make-up man and Whitney are looking at each other, Whitney suddenly bites him
While Beth is turning around, Stuart suddenly punches her
As Stuart is saying “You’re a stupid f’ing c**t” he is interrupted by Beth suddenly pulling his schlong out
A car suddenly crashes into the back of Kylie’s car
The driver of the white car walks up to Kylie’s window, accompanied with a loud musical sting
The computer that Kylie’s using, short-circuits
The freezer makes a mechanical noise, startling Kylie
A statue of Jesus wrapped in a white sheet stumbles and falls towards Kylie
After Kylie’s ankle bracelet beeps, grabbing her attention, a diseased-looking hand comes out from under a piece of furniture and grabs her leg
While she’s in the shower, Kylie crouches and is then attacked by the possessed teddy bear, accompanied by a loud musical sting
Graham startles Kylie while she’s dancing
The lights come back on and a veiled figure suddenly appears besides Dennis, accompanied by a loud musical stinger
While Amos is trying to look through the presumed killer’s window, Kylie suddenly opens it from inside, startling Amos in the process, accompanied by a musical stinger
The flash from Amos’s camera reveals the presumed killer’s silhouette standing behind a window, staring at Amos. This is accompanied by a loud musical stinger
The burned teddy bear in the back of Amos’s car suddenly starts to speak and startles him, accompanied by a musical stinger
Eugene slams into the door of the pick-up truck just as Kylie closes it. Accompanied by a musical stinger
Kylie turns around and Miriam suddenly appears in front of her
A sudden scene transition from a silent scene to Kylie loudly and violently opening a kitchen shelf may startle some viewers
Dennis suddenly goes on the attack, accompanied by a musical stinger
Miriam opens a cupboard in the bathroom and Eugene stumbles out of it, prompting both of them to scream. Close-up on Miriam’s face as she’s screaming. Accompanied by a musical stinger
After stabbing Eugene through the wall, Dennis suddenly kicks down the wall
Dennis suddenly comes out of frame and punches Kylie unconscious

movies.title: Hotel Inferno 3: The Castle of Screams

jump_scares.spoiler: Frank quickly removes a woman’s hood and underneath is revealed to be a burnt corpse that begins to growl
As Frank slowly reaches for the the hood, the woman suddenly stabs him
The woman suddenly attacks Frank
A demon smashes through the wall as Frank turns around
Frank peers into a dark alleyway and the camera quickly zooms onto one of the mini demons as it shrieks
Frank looks up at the ceiling and sees a large chicken claw dangling from above the boards accompanied by a sound cue
A demon jumps out from behind a pile of flesh and bones
Frank looks down on the floor and sees there is a demon right underneath him
The camera pans back and reveals Danny standing in the doorway
A bag is suddenly thrown over Scott’s head after he knocks on the door
The camera cuts to a barking dog
A door swings open
The mirror suddenly opens to reveal it was actually a door and a gas masked man steps out
Travis jumps out in front of Justin
After getting in his car, Flemming is grabbed by Carter in the backseat
Jang Kyung-chul breaks the window of the car
Jang Kyung-chul leaps from the left and tackles Jang Se-yun
A man appears in front of the car and gets hit
For the next one-and-a-half-minutes there is a fast montage of flashy, sometimes scary looking images
The body-double suddenly opens his eyes
There is a sudden cut to a man shooting a vase
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
While Kyra reaches for the mirror cabinet there is a knock on the door, startling her
A sharp blade suddenly pierces through the wall
A deformed looking man jumps in front of the camera while it zooms in on a dark room
A hand breaks through the door and grabs Kyra
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest
A sound effect plays as Jeremiah becomes agitated when asking Marlene to fetch Brother Swan
As the lights flicker, the Black Skulls suddenly grab Red and Mandy from their beds
Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen
A girl is stabbed up through the bottom of her chin
The sound of a door slamming shut
Hiding under a car, Frank suddenly cuts a girl’s Achilles tendon as she comes close
Anna’s friend Martin is suddenly sliced with a cleaver through his mouth and face
Martin, who we presume is dead at the time, suddenly hits Frank with a baseball bat
As Frank opens his van door, Anna, presumed to be still out cold, suddenly stabs him

movies.title: My Heart Can’t Beat Unless You Tell It To

jump_scares.spoiler: Jessie shoves the table suddenly and storms off
A door slams shut
There is a sudden bang on the door
A teenage boy jumps out with a gas mask on and  growling to scare Sarah

Sarah is suddenly grabbed from behind
Harry Ward is shot from behind just as he was about to attack Tom
‘Frank The Trucker’ opens his cab door, only to see Harry Ward in the cab, immediately followed by Harry Stabbing Frank through the top of his skull
A sudden sound cue and visual of pool balls being hit
Tom turns around and is suddenly attacked by Harry Ward
Tom turns around in the cage only to be face to face with the killer
Harry Ward suddenly appears and attacks Ben Foley
The lights in the grocery store abruptly and loudly turn off
The pick-axe goes through the door missing Sarah’s face by a hair
Harry Ward suddenly appears at the window
Ex-Sheriff Burke suddenly bangs on the car window
The deputy opens the bloodied dryer door and a steaming, grotesque head falls out
Ex-Sheriff Burke turns around and is immediately stabbed by Harry Ward
Harry’s shadow appears on the wall
A miner’s uniform suddenly falls
Harry ward suddenly appears
Tom swings a pick-axe at his rescuer, stabbing him through the head

movies.title: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight

jump_scares.spoiler: A postman gets grabbed by his feet and pulled inside a hole

A boy looks at his friend and sees her gruesomely killed

As Hoffman is walking away, he is jumped by three people in pig masks

Laura screams and falls back in her chair
The camera flashes to Laura on the ground with a loud soundtrack noise
Trevor speaks from offscreen and Rose drops her wine glass
The home security alarm goes off and Rose drops her glass

The phone rings suddenly again
Rose awakens abruptly from a nightmare

The camera cuts to a smiling partygoer standing very close to Rose with an accompanying sound effect

Woman barks like a dog suddenly

There is a loud noise and the lights start to flicker

when Emily takes her hands off the painting, she sees that her hands are bleeding

As martin looks through a book, a unseen force knocks him off the ladder

A demon grabs  Chris’s leg from under the toilet stall

Scene cut to stuffed pig with snort sound
Mom walks away revealing a figure behind her (no sound
Door shuts
Bloody face appears with loud sound
Woman turns into a bloody face
Kid jumps out to scare the other kids
A teen hold a jar with a spider in it. The jar suddenly breaks

Dominic appears behind the girls and grabs them as they scream
A bloody woman smashes against the car window
A dog runs out of dark hole

The camera pans to the left exposing a crawler

A crawler attacks Greg

A crawler jumps towards Vaines

A crawler jumps out from under the water a second time
Juno comes into camera view and screams

A crawler jumps out of the hole towards the camera
There is an explosion from the wreckage of the aircraft
A spear pierces through Kara’s neck
One of the tribesmen grabs Justine around the leg

Brent is grabbed by Lola from behind while looking down the hole
Lola’s scrapbook flies at the windshield while Holly is driving
While the camera slowly zooms in on Lola there is a cut to the car right in front of her when they collide
As Lizzie sits on a bed nursing her amputated arm, we get 3 short sharp flash backs to Lizzie screaming which may startle some sensitive viewers
With very little warning, Leatherface comes out of the record vault after Choptop points it out
Leatherface crashes through the door behind LG
Leatherface breaks through the wall behind Stretch
Sudden chainsaw noises up ahead startle Stretch
Leatherface bursts out of the tunnel in front of Stretch
Stretch is grabbed from above by Choptop
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
A reporter walks down a dark hallway and is hit by a stick held by someone off-screen
Alison lifts up a can of bug spray to reveal Dale standing behind it watching her
Chloe puts her hand on Alison’s shoulder
An unseen person appears in camera shot, ambushing the woman hiding behind the tree trunk
Chad taps on the car door and yells out (as a joke) which startles Alison
Chloe jumps out in front of the cop car
There are several loud gunshots
Chad ambushes Tucker who is attempting to hide behind a tree trunk
Dale looks up and sees Mitch impaled on the tree
The ice cream truck quickly drives in from the side and runs over a cop
There is a sudden loud shriek and the woman on the bed is flung to the side
Demonic hands suddenly appear out of the cape and grab Scarlett
The door to the gate suddenly flies upwards by itself
The cameraman suddenly screams as a bone cracking sound is heard, followed by him turning back to the woman who rips his arm out
The camera suddenly shatters as the cameraman is stabbed
A cloud of dust shoots out of the sewer gate as a growl is heard
While the camera is lying on the ground, a cloud of dust shoots into screen from the side after a few seconds
The ice cream truck suddenly begins blasting music which startles Kev
The running woman stops to catch her breath, and as the camera begins to spin around her she is suddenly hit with a club
Nacho jumps out from behind a door as a joke
A club suddenly breaks the front window of the car
The killer drops down to the ground and looks at Vasco
A car’s headlights suddenly turn on in the background
(-1:11:10) A quiet scene suddenly cuts to a loud ventilator
(-1:05:14) A hand suddenly comes out of the hole in the decapitated head
(-45:04) As Will opens the cupboard a cockroach flies out
